name: Project: Eden
description:
Project: Eden is a Top-down Metroidvania game focusing on Exploration and Gravity-based world interaction as combat and or puzzle means. With backtracking element, unlock more skills by exploring every nook and cranny of the world.

Team:
Myself (Game Designer & Sound Artist)
Hafizh Fauzan (Project Manager)
Gede Binar Kukuh W (Lead Programmer)
Helmika Mahendra P (Programmer)
Alan Luthfi (Programmer)
Tanisha Amalia P (2D Artist)
Maydlinne Liudyvia (2D Artist)
